body:
Not entirely sure where to start…
- [ ] WWDC videos
- [ ] [Core Audio Overview](https://developer.apple.com/library/mac/documentation/MusicAudio/Conceptual/CoreAudioOverview/Introduction/Introduction.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40003577-CH1-SW1)
- [ ] [Audio Unit Hosting Guide](https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/MusicAudio/Conceptual/AudioUnitHostingGuide_iOS/Introduction/Introduction.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40009492-CH1-SW1)
- [x] [~~Audio Unit Programming Guide~~](https://developer.apple.com/library/mac/documentation/MusicAudio/Conceptual/AudioUnitProgrammingGuide/Introduction/Introduction.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40003278-CH1-SW2) (old and OS X oriented)
- [ ] [Effect Units](https://developer.apple.com/library/mac/documentation/MusicAudio/Conceptual/AudioUnitProgrammingGuide/Tutorial-BuildingASimpleEffectUnitWithAGenericView/Tutorial-BuildingASimpleEffectUnitWithAGenericView.html)
- [ ] [Piano Sample Code](https://github.com/meech-ward/iOS-Core-Audio-Piano/blob/master/README.md)
- [ ] [Mixer Host Sample Code](https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/samplecode/MixerHost/Introduction/Intro.html)
- [ ] [Synth Mixer Sample Code](https://github.com/scussen/synthmixerdemo/blob/master/README.md)
- [ ] [AUPreset Files](http://www.electricpeelsoftware.com/2013/02/22/creating-aupreset-files.html)
- [ ] [Loading Presets Sample Code](https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/samplecode/LoadPresetDemo/Introduction/Intro.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/DTS40011214-Intro-DontLinkElementID_2)

title: Consider the interplay between note buttons, pitch, and background color

milestone.title: Future Version
milestone.description: These issues are on hold for now.

body:
My initial thought:
- Pastel red, green, and blue note buttons
- A very dark background that matches the current note buttons, e.g. red + green = yellow
- Slightly increase the brightness of the background as pitch increases
- Quickly fade the color from one to the next when it changes
